meanings.definition: A group of red pigments found in tomatoes and other red fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: Tomatoes contain lycopenes that give them their red color.
meanings.sent2: Red fruits like watermelon also have lycopenes in them.
meanings.sent3: The lycopenes in the tomato blushed when they realized they were the reason for its vibrant color.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as red as lycopenes, making her look like a ripe tomato.
meanings.sent5: The lycopenes danced in the sunlight, painting everything around them in a beautiful red hue.

meanings.definition: Antioxidants that may help protect cells from damage.
meanings.sent1: Eating foods rich in lycopenes can be good for your health.
meanings.sent2: Lycopenes are believed to have protective properties against cell harm.
meanings.sent3: The lycopenes in the bodyguards' uniforms glowed brightly, ready to shield the cells from harm.
meanings.sent4: Her love was like lycopenes, guarding his heart from any potential damage.
meanings.sent5: The lycopenes stood strong like warriors, defending the cells from any threats.
